introduction.title: Hi! I'm Peter Evsikov
introduction.subtitle: Principal Engineer focused on architecture and technical leadership
introduction.description: Building product systems since 2012 across fintech, healthcare, education, and e-commerce. I specialize in architecting solutions and establishing development processes — from technical decisions to team formation. Launched projects from scratch, scaled to thousands of users, achieved top rankings in app stores. Full-stack experience across backend, frontend, and mobile gives me a holistic product vision and the ability to make sound technical decisions.
